verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: announced] [ARGM-TMP: Thursday] [ARG1: that he is imposing tariffs on steel and aluminum imports from Mexico , Canada , and the European Union] .
President Donald Trump announced Thursday that he [V: is] imposing tariffs on steel and aluminum imports from Mexico , Canada , and the European Union .
